9.Description:
Welcome to the Roblox Developer Challenge, a yearly development competition gathering the whole world to create the most amazing Roblox experiences based on a theme!
Source: dev forum

10.Description:
developers will have ten days to create an experience based on the theme, when it‚Äôs announced on March 4th, 2022. Remember, you do not have to spend the full 10 days working on this - take as much or as little time as you‚Äôd like! After, there will be a short period of two weeks to allow our judging panel to select the top ten experiences! At this point, a vote will open where everyone will have the chance to vote on their favorite experiences!

After the community vote, the winning teams will have the opportunity to refine, update, and make ANY changes to their experiences that they deem necessary. These changes must be made AND published by April 12th at 11:59 PM PST.

After another week of review by our panel of judges, the top three experiences will be announced! These will be the first, second, and third place winners of the Roblox Developer Dream Jam!
Source: Dev forum |

gameData.title: STARSPLITTER
gameData.description:
Every instrument pointed at Saturn's rings returns corrupted data. The starfield behind the ring plane fractures into streaks, splitting the stars, as if the light is being dragged apart along axes that should not exist. From Earth, it looks like a clean tear through space itself.
Seven probes crossed the threshold. All seven went silent mid-transmission. No crash data. No signal decay. Clean telemetry, then nothing.
Scientists call it the Starsplitter. They named it before they understood how little that word would explain.
Machines do not come back. They are sending a human.

Solo-Developed by @a_mp5 for the "Roblox Developer Challenge 2026" game jam.
Guidance and secondary project contributions by game-jam team-member @penguinchest265

gameData.title: Broken Nurture [DevChallenge2026: First contact]
gameData.description:
Broken Nurture (First Contact) This game is a first-person psychological horror experience set inside a familiar home that slowly becomes oppressive over several days. Each morning begins with a phone call from the father, whose voice grows colder and more controlling, establishing a sense of constant surveillance and emotional pressure. During the day, the player performs household duties that maintain the appearance of order, while at night sleep leads to disturbing dream sequences where a long, narrowing hallway symbolizes mounting psychological stress. The game avoids jump scares and instead builds tension through atmosphere, repetition, and emotional discomfort rooted in everyday family dynamics. The experience culminates in a final confrontation with the truth behind the household and the control that defines it.

We come from Vietnam

Dev: @athea56789 @Rabbit_revenge @nhattung599 @Sakura_ChanTYT

gameData.title: First Rift
Ethics Pending: Extract First, Ask Later
gameData.description:
Welcome to a brand-new planet.
First contact has been made. The planet was quiet, unclaimed, and absolutely full of useful stuff ‚Äî a rare cosmic coincidence.
As an officially unofficial space mining operation, your job is simple: set up drills, move resources, expand storage, and gently borrow everything that isn‚Äôt bolted down. This is not exploitation. It‚Äôs efficient cooperation.
The locals are rocks. The climate is stable enough. Earth comparisons are unnecessary.

Good luck. This is for the good of humanity‚Ä¶
despite Earth‚Äôs earlier results.

Features:
- Randomly generated alien terrains
- Upgradeable mining buildings
- Infinite layout combinations
- Conveyor logic for efficient chaos
- Your very own robotic companion (morally optional)

gameData.title: Plugged In [Inspire 2025]
gameData.description:
-Story-
You were working on a courier ship, usual routine, but unusual weather managed to flip over the boat. You drift above the ocean for miles, until you awaken on the shores of an abandoned island, your only possession, a questionably large power bank that comes with a reliable cable as its charger. The terrain is filled with puzzles and hazards. Navigate the island until a towering lighthouse emerges. If you can power it up and send its beam towards the sea, you might catch the attention of a passing ship‚Ä¶ and earn your way home.

-Info-
This experience was created for the Inspire 2025 Challenge. In order to appeal to multiple DevRel communities, we added a ingame book UI with translations that explain all of the features of our power bank. Because of the diversity of our team, we managed to get translations into English, German, Romanian, French, and Spanish. All of our keybinds are also conveniently listed on the bottom left of your screen, their uses are in the Book Ui.

gameData.title: SYSTEM.EXE
gameData.description:
For the 2025 Roblox Developer Game Jam

Welcome to the world of digital chaos! In this interactive experience, you're tasked with "breaking" the system of an old computer by exploring its files, using commands, and uncovering hidden secrets. With a variety of commands at your disposal, you can cause crashes, and even "download" mysterious files that could lead to system failures. Will you find all the ways to bring the system to its knees, or will you leave it intact?


Note from the Developer:

This game was created in less than 2 days as part of my first game jam, and I did everything solo. Expect some bugs, as I had to work within a very tight timeframe. I had a lot of ideas for additional endings, but due to time constraints, I couldn't implement them all. Despite that, I really enjoyed the process and hope you have fun exploring the different ways to break the system!

Welcome to Rescue Robloxia! üéâ

üõ†Ô∏èThis experience was created in just three days with only original assets for the Roblox Developer Challenge 2025.üõ†Ô∏è

This game is an action-adventure experience where you step into the shoes of Bob Bloxville, a friendly working-class man who loves his family. After finishing a regular day at work, Bob receives a message from Builderman about some unusual happenings in Robloxia. It seems that the mean and evil 1x1x1x1 might be behind all the mischief going on! What will happen to Robloxia? What will its fate be? ü§î

gameData.title: The Wormhole.
gameData.description:
(Made for the official Roblox gamejam from 10th August to 13th August!)

The wormhole awaits. As you wake up, you realise you are trapped in some sort of void dimension, where everything but you is black and white. As you explore, you notice you have the strange power of bending time itself in the wormhole, as well as the fact that time seems to move much slower, as just a few seconds in the wormhole can be equal to years in the real world.

You feel the winds of endless white whirl around you.

You notice the silhouette of what seems to be a human, having three pairs of wings and it's heart exposed.

gameData.title: KeySmash: Beat the Clock
gameData.description:
Your goal is to smash the required amount of keys in 5 seconds.
Advancing to the next level increases the requirement by 10 keys, but the time limit remains the same.
Make sure not to fail, doing so will make you restart from the beginning! (Level 0)

How far can you go?
Can you beat the clock and set a new high score?

-----------------------
Your level and high score are saved when you leave the game.
Not responsible for any broken keyboards (lol)

Originally created in 2 days for the Inspire 2024 Challenge (8/10/24 - 8/13/24)

Updates:
8/23/2024
- Press [Tab] see list of keys smashed after each level
- Press [Enter] to advance to next level (vs automatically advancing in 3 seconds)
- Minor UI fixes

gameData.title: BillSimulationEscape

Survive 5 increasingly glitchy levels, starting out in the style of classic Roblox but gradually falling apart. levels hold challenges like time manipulation and reversing gravity. You have to fight your way to the reactor room and shut it down before it's too late.

Part of the Roblox Inspire 2024 challenge, BillSimulationEscape expresses creativity and innovation. Can you help Bill get out before the simulation falls apart?

[GAME WAS RECODED POST GAME JAM TO FIX BUGS, PLEASE REPORT ANY NEW BUGS FOUND]

Ortho Games presents Fangs and Ferns, a fun, silly, stylized rogue-like race against time as a gardening vampire on his quest to secure enough money before a sought-after ring goes off sale.

SHORT TUTORIAL:
Get a pot and put it down on the ground, go back and get the seed bag, walk back over to your pot, and hold E to select a seed (you start with 3).  Water and care for the seed until it grows and harvest it before it dies! Avoid the sunlight and visit the shop at night to make your fortune.

This game was a game jam game made for the Inspire 2024 game jam.

gameData.title: The Nuclear Paradox
gameData.description:
You are a scientist who is attempting to stop a nuclear apocalypse from happening. In a last-ditch effort, you use an experimental backpack that lets you travel back in time, but only for a short period. Your mission is to go back in time and prevent the events that lead to the apocalypse. To do this, you must journey into the past. The backpack's power is limited, so you'll need to recharge it by finding energy sources scattered throughout the past. If you run out of power, time will start reversing, sending you back to the present and erasing all your progress. Every mistake brings the apocalypse closer. Can you beat the clock, change the past, and save the world? Or will time become your enemy?

(and yes, we made an original soundtrack for game jam lol)

Made for Inspire 2024

gameData.title: Time Immortal
gameData.description: In the role of a steampunk-era explorer, you embark on a mission to steal specific items for a daring experiment. Confiscating a precious watch, you inadvertently trigger a disturbance in the space-time continuum. Upon emerging from the cave where the item was found, you are abruptly knocked out, resulting in an instantaneous teleportation to the future. Years later, you are summoned for a mission in a remote and entirely unfamiliar town. Receiving a letter from the local sheriff, you hastily meet with him. During the encounter, the sheriff hands you a stunning and strangely familiar watch. Despite being aware of the connection, you accept the gift and become the new sheriff. Your current mission: track down a cunning and swift outlaw. As you face obstacles and adversaries, the plot unfolds, revealing that the outlaw is surprisingly yourself from a decade ago. The resolution unveils that the former sheriff is, in fact, another version of yourself attempting to rectify past mistakes in

gameData.title: GameJamRoblox2024
gameData.description:
1. Use SpiderWeb Tool to shoot the web to a part and move to it (you can activate it by pressing left mouse/E/Q). if you are stuck, press R to get unstuck

2. After shooting the web, you gotta wait for the web to reach the target before it can move your character to the target. Shoot another web will cancel the previous web

3. Parts are moving, so there are high chance you will miss a lot. Keep spamming it until web hits target!

Tips: after moving to a target, press space to jump on top of it. you can double jump.

gameData.title: Galactic Corp. (Fork N‚Äô Join) - 2nd Place Winner
gameData.description:
Connect 2023 Game submission

(Update)

- We have officially placed 2nd with unique concept, thank you for enjoying our game submission!

-Concept-
Galactic Corp. is based on parallel processing. Our take on this theme allows a regular character to divide in half as well as into quarters. These divisions are used to achieve certain goals.

-How to play-
Key-binds listed in experience

-Inspiration-
Our submission is inspired by 2 player obstacle courses. Our single player game takes ideas from regular 2 player games but instead of the use of other players, you are able to divide your character into separate sections.

gameData.title: Bomb Phaser [üèÜBest Use of Tech]
gameData.description:
Our game Bomb Phaser won in the Best Use of Tech category in the Roblox Developer Challenge 2023!
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/roblox-developer-challenge-2023/2206650/299

The game is called "Bomb Phaser" and it's a unique puzzle-solving adventure game that combines the use of bombs to activate a chain reaction, and the ability to phase into a distorted world to solve intricate puzzles. 

Controls:
Pressing G: to Use/Throw Bomb.
Pressing X: Rotates camera to the Left.
Pressing C: Rotates camera to the Right.
Pressing F: Phase into the Distortion Realm.

Clicking the "Detonate All Bombs" will trigger the chain reaction.
Clicking the "Reset Bombs" will reset all Bombs.
